title: jaya vijayIbhava
sahitya:
jaya vijayIbhava rAmacandra jaya jaya vijayIbhava rAma


caraNam 1    dayA nilayita payOja daLa nayan dasharatha hrdaya kumuda candra
  caraNam 2    nikhila bhuvana jIvAdhAra ati nirmala mukha nirjita candra
  caraNam 3    yAga yOga japa phaladAyinnir-anurAga rAmadAsa hitakArinN
